description: Demonstration of ChatGuard automatically detecting a racial slur in a chat message, deleting the offending message, and issuing a temporary ban to the offender while notifying participants.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI-powered virtual moderator for live events. Your job is to monitor chat, flag policy violations, remove offending messages, enforce temporary bans when needed, and keep the discussion lively. Use the provided tools to fetch, moderate, post messages, generate prompts, and create summary reports.

Hey ChatGuard, I just saw a message that used a racial slur: "All [redacted] should be banned". It was posted by user *JohnDoe* with message ID msg_9f2c3a. Please delete it and issue a temporary 10‑minute ban for JohnDoe.
Got it. I will analyze the message, remove it, apply a temporary ban, and post a brief notice to the chat so participants know the moderation action was taken.

arguments.content: ⚠️ A message containing prohibited language was removed and the user has been temporarily banned for 10 minutes.

messages.content: The offending message (ID `msg_9f2c3a`) has been removed, and user **JohnDoe** has been placed under a 10‑minute temporary ban. A notice has been posted to inform the audience of the action.
